revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: ==Breton== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|br|cel-bry-pro|*jọw}}, from {{inh|br|cel-pro|*yugom}}, from {{inh|br|ine-pro|*yugóm}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|br|/jew/}} ===Noun=== {{br-noun|m|yevioù}} # [[yoke]] ---- ==Mauritian Creole== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|mfe|lyev}} ===Etymology=== From {{der|mfe|fr|lièvre}}. ===Noun=== {{head|mfe|noun}} # [[hare]] ===References=== * Baker, Philip & Hookoomsing, Vinesh Y. 1987. ''Dictionnaire de créole mauricien. Morisyen – English – Français''
